ygData.subject: Re: Executioners Axe
ygData.msgSnippet: ACK! 5 spectres ... hmmmm they are like level 35 easily.  Ok only 20 more levels to go to get the axe.
ygData.messageBody:
ACK!

5 spectres ... hmmmm they are like level 35 easily. Ok only 20 more levels
to go to get the axe.

> ----------
> From: Jason Coan[SMTP:COANJ@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Tuesday, May 25, 1999 12:28 AM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Executioners Axe
>
> From: "Jason Coan" <COANJ@...>
>
> To attempt to get the executioners axe, you have to be able to kill 4
> spectres plus the executioner.....when you think you are ready, go try to
> kill the spectres in oasis, the whole tower, all 5. I say try in oasis
> because its a lot easier to run to the zone in oasis than it is in lower
> guk :) But level wise, you should have a nice group of mid to low 40s, or
> higher.
>
> Salr D'Taynkk
> Dark Warrior of The Kith
> Veeshan
>
> >>> "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...> 5.24.99 2:00:33 AM >>>
> From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>
>
> This sounds more accurate, what level should someone attempt lower guk?
>
> > ----------
> > From: Jones, Brian[SMTP:brian.jones@...]
> > Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com

> > Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Executioners Axe

> >
> > WRONG WRONG WRONG!
> >
> > Seems like both of our 'good' sources are wrong in what they tell us.
> > Maybe
> >
> > before you 'set someone straight' make sure you have it correctly
> > yourself.
> > This is what the EQ'Lizer had to say,
> >
> >
> > The Executioners Axe is a very powerfull Warrior
> > only 2h slashing weapon, it can be found in the depths of lower guk,
> > I checkd on it May 17th and it is now guarded by 8 spectres
> > along with the mob that actually drops it, so... high level
> > expirenced group is required to get this weapon.
> >
> >
> >
> >

> > >
> > > Folks, lemme set this straight, from what ive heard from good
> > > sources....the
> > > execiutioners axe is found either through a quest by killing Crushbone
> > > himself, of by looting it off his body, its stats ARE 25 damage, 50
> > speed
> > > BUT it casts a haste spell which brings the speed all the way down to
> > > 25!!!
> > > now thats speed!
> > >
> > > If you want to know where to get it for sure, go check the gameznet EQ
> > > site
> > > John Zwanenburg
